project_intro.title: Enduroom UEM
project_intro.description: This case study focuses on the redesign and enhancement of a Unified Endpoint Management (UEM) application to address critical flaws in its current user interface (UI) and user flows. The goal is to create a more intuitive, efficient, and user-friendly experience for IT administrators, improving their ability to manage and secure a diverse range of endpoints effectively.

details.title: What is a UEM? And Why it is required?
details.description: Unified Endpoint Management (UEM) is a solution that allows organizations to manage and secure all devices, including desktops, laptops, smartphones, and tablets, from a single platform. UEM is essential for ensuring consistent security policies, simplifying IT management, supporting BYOD environments, and providing a unified approach to managing diverse endpoints, ultimately improving operational efficiency and security.

details.title: Context
details.description: In the existing UEM solution, users have encountered challenges due to a cluttered UI, complex user flows, and inefficient navigation and inconsistent experiences across different platforms. which have led to decreased productivity and increased frustration. By addressing these issues, the redesigned application aims to provide a cleaner, more focused user experience, leveraging data insights to empower IT administrators with the information they need, while maintaining a consistent and minimalistic design

key_improve.title: Simplified User Flows
key_improve.description: Complex user flows have been restructured to reduce the number of steps required to perform key tasks. This includes optimizing device enrollment processes, policy management, and compliance monitoring, allowing administrators to complete tasks more efficiently.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Dashboard Customization
key_improve.description: The main dashboard now offers enhanced customization options, enabling users to tailor their workspace to their specific needs. This includes drag-and-drop widgets, personalized alerts, and quick access to essential tools.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Enhanced Visual Feedback
key_improve.description: The new design provides more immediate and clear visual feedback for actions taken, such as device enrollment status, policy enforcement, and compliance alerts, helping users stay informed and in control.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Streamlined Reporting
key_improve.description: The reporting feature has been improved with more accessible and customizable reporting options, allowing IT administrators to generate and share reports with ease, and gain insights faster.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Data-Driven Design Optimization
key_improve.description: The data-driven design section has been significantly improved to present key insights and metrics in a more digestible and actionable format. This includes the use of simplified data visualizations, intuitive dashboards, and contextual information that helps administrators make informed decisions quickly.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Cross-Platform Consistency
key_improve.description: The application now offers a seamless and consistent user experience across all supported platforms and operating systems, including Windows, macOS, iOS, Android, and Linux. The design has been kept minimalistic to reduce visual clutter and ensure that the core functionality is easily accessible regardless of the platform.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

refreshed_designs.title: Refreshed Designs
refreshed_designs.final_outcome: The redesigned UEM application delivers a significantly improved user experience, allowing IT administrators to manage endpoints more efficiently and effectively. The enhancements to the UI and user flows result in faster task completion, reduced training time, and a more satisfying user experience overall. This case study demonstrates the value of a user-centered approach in addressing existing flaws and creating a product that better serves its users.

designs.title: Enhanced Feel & Functions
designs.description: The UEM app facelift introduces a revamped dashboard with enhanced customization options, all while maintaining a minimalistic design. This ensures users can easily access and personalize essential information without clutter.

designs.title: Segmented Filters
designs.description: The filter section has been significantly enhanced, offering a more compact design that improves grouping and categorization throughout the app. This makes it easier for users to efficiently navigate and refine their search criteria.

designs.title: Custom Reports
designs.description: The custom reports section now offers enhanced flexibility, allowing users to generate and tailor reports to meet specific needs, all within a streamlined and user-friendly interface.

designs.title: Nested Conditional filters
designs.description: Conditional filters and logical operations have been enhanced, offering better nesting functionalities for more precise and flexible filtering within the UEM application.

designs.title: Tables
designs.description: The tables have been redesigned to handle more data efficiently, with a better format and responsive design for an improved user experience across all devices.

designs.title: Deployments
designs.description: The design has been optimized like deployments to effectively manage multi-platform scenarios, ensuring seamless functionality across various operating systems.

designs.title: Flexible Designs
designs.description: The design has been made responsive and consistent across all devices, ensuring a seamless and uniform user experience regardless of screen size.

next_case_study.title: Enduroom Design system
next_case_study.description: Carefully curated design system to maintain the consistency across all platforms and devices.

pageData.description: Keep the details under wraps—this is top-secret design stuff. No sharing, no spoilers!

pageData.title: Hope y’all enjoyed the ride
pageData.description: Feel free to drop your Feedbacks or Suggestions!
